content: > this granny square blanket is the > perfect addition to your home for > fall the pumpkin patch blanket is an > easy crochet project worked up in red > heart super saver an acrylic worsted > weight yarn that comes in over 120 > beautiful colors crochet the blanket > as shown or select your favorite > colors to match your decor make it > spooky for halloween or spice it up > for thanksgiving weekend no matter > the shades you choose the whole > family is sure to love this festive > blanket during the fall season
